Car stolen with baby inside: What Michael Jai Smith did while on the runhttps://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/car-stolen-from-waitara-with-baby-inside-what-michael-jai-smith-did-while-on-the-run/BBQNQF7WOJCHXJ37X2LAACML4I/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/car-stolen-from-waitara-with-baby-inside-what-michael-jai-smith-did-while-on-the-run/BBQNQF7WOJCHXJ37X2LAACML4I/ Tara ShaskeyMichael Smith stole a car that had a baby asleep in the backseat. Then he went on the lam. Sat, 29 Jun 2024 17:00:00 +0000 Michael Jai Smith spent a week on the run after he stole a car from Waitara which had a baby in it. He then abandoned the infant on the roadside.
